full_summary:
### Liquid Aluminum Sulfate Tender Invitation

#### Notice Number
Reference: WS3861622287-Doc3906343693

#### Tender Status
This tender is now expired.

#### Request for Proposal Description
The Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden's Waste Water Treatment Plant requires the supply and delivery of potable-grade filtered liquid aluminum sulfate.

#### Requirements

* The bidder must provide sufficient documentation to demonstrate compliance with all mandatory evaluation criteria.
* Pricing must be submitted in accordance with the Basis of Payment annex, in Canadian Funds.
* The bidder must provide the sulfate d’aluminum liquide filtré to Building 0-97, 164C Cambrai Rd. Borden, ON.

#### Mandatory Evaluation Criteria

Please refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) Annex - Technical Evaluation Criteria document for the complete list of mandatory evaluation criteria.

#### Regional and Delivery Details

* The tender is open to all provinces in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).
* The delivery will be made to the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden's Waste Water Treatment Plant.

#### ESA, Trade and Tariff Considerations
* This tender is covered under the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* Relevant trade and tariff considerations must be taken into account when submitting a bid.

#### Contracting Details

* Contractor lead time: W0517
* Contact Name: Victoria Kotsopoulos2 (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [victoria.kotsopoulos2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:victoria.kotsopoulos2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Attachment and References

* Refer to the RFP and Attachments for further details.
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15620220?extsite=MTU2MjAyMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15620220?extsite=MTU2MjAyMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note that the information on the GSOIN (Government Supply Office Identification Number) and NIBS (North America Industry Classification System) terms will use *international identifiers.*
